content.text: As the financial year draws to a close, it's crucial to optimize your tax liability. Here are proven strategies to maximize your tax savings in 2026.
Section 80C allows deductions up to ₹1.5 lakh on various investments and expenses. Popular options include ELSS mutual funds, PPF, EPF, life insurance premiums, and children's tuition fees.
Under Section 80D, you can claim deductions for health insurance premiums. The limit is ₹25,000 for self and family, with an additional ₹25,000 for parents (₹50,000 if parents are senior citizens).

items: Home loan interest: Deduction up to ₹2 lakh under Section 24
NPS contributions: Additional ₹50,000 deduction under Section 80CCD(1B)
Education loan interest: Full deduction under Section 80E
